info.name: pharmaegy API v1
info.description:
Collection for pharmaegy API v1 Endpoints

Authentication: This API uses HTTP-only cookies for authentication. Login endpoints set secure cookies that are automatically included in subsequent requests.

body.raw:
{
  "email": "testpha1@gmail.com",
  "password": "password123",
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe",
  "phoneNumber": "01234567890",
  "bio": "Experienced pharmacist with 5 years in retail pharmacy",
  "experience": "5 years working in retail pharmacy, specializing in patient counseling and medication management",
  "education": "PharmD from Cairo University, Bachelor of Pharmaceutical Sciences",
  "city": "Cairo",
  "area": "Nasr City"
}

request.description: Registers a new pharmacist.

body.raw:
{
  "email": "testpharmacy1@gmail.com",
  "password": "password123",
  "pharmacyName": "Example Pharmacy",
  "contactPerson": "Jane Smith",
  "phoneNumber": "01234567890",
  "address": "123 Main St, City, Country",
  "city": "Cairo",
  "area": "Nasr City"
}

request.description: Registers a new pharmacy owner.
Logs in a user (pharmacist or pharmacy owner). Sets HTTP-only cookie for authentication.
Logs in an admin user. Sets HTTP-only cookie for authentication.
Logs out the current user and clears the authentication cookie.

header.value: token=; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=Strict; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT

request.description: Gets the profile of the authenticated pharmacist.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "pharmacist_id",
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Doe",
    "email": "pharmacist@example.com",
    "phoneNumber": "+1234567890",
    "bio": "Experienced pharmacist",
    "experience": "5 years in retail pharmacy",
    "education": "PharmD from University of Example",
    "city": "Cairo",
    "area": "Nasr City",
    "available": true,
    "cv": {
      "url": "http://localhost:5000/uploads/cvs/cv-1234567890.pdf",
      "uploadedAt": "2023-06-15T10:30:00Z"
    },
    "createdAt": "2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-06-15T10:30:00.000Z"
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe",
  "phoneNumber": "+1234567890",
  "bio": "Updated bio information",
  "experience": "6 years in retail pharmacy",
  "education": "PharmD from University of Example",
  "city": "Cairo",
  "area": "Nasr City",
  "available": true
}

request.description: Updates the profile of the authenticated pharmacist.

response.name: Profile Updated Successfully
response.body:
{
  "message": "Profile updated successfully",
  "profile": {
    "id": "profile_id",
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Doe",
    "phoneNumber": "+1234567890",
    "bio": "Updated bio information",
    "experience": "6 years in retail pharmacy",
    "education": "PharmD from University of Example",
    "city": "Cairo",
    "area": "Nasr City",
    "available": true
  }
}

query.description: (optional): Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)

request.description: Searches for pharmacists. No Auth Required.

response.name: Pharmacists Found

request.description:
Upload or update the CV for the authenticated pharmacist.

**Supported file types:** PDF, DOC, DOCX
**Max file size:** 5MB

originalRequest.description:
Upload or update the CV for the authenticated pharmacist.

**Supported file types:** PDF, DOC, DOCX
**Max file size:** 5MB

request.description: Get the CV information for the authenticated pharmacist.

originalRequest.description: Get the CV information for the authenticated pharmacist.

item.name: Pharmacy Owner Endpoints

request.description: Gets the profile of the authenticated pharmacy owner.

response.name: Pharmacy Owner Profile Retrieved
response.body:
{

  "pharmacyName": "Example Pharmacy",
  "contactPerson": "Jane Smith",
  "phoneNumber": "+1234567890",
  "address": "123 Main St, City, Country",
  "city": "Cairo",
  "area": "Nasr City",
  "subscriptionType": "PREMIUM",
  "subscriptionExpiresAt": "2024-12-31T23:59:59Z"
}

response.name: Profile Updated Successfully

request.description: Updates the subscription for the authenticated pharmacy owner.

item.name: Store Endpoints

request.description: Gets all products available in the store.
Searches for products with various filters.

response.name: Products Found

variable.description: ID of the product to retrieve

request.description: Gets a specific product by its ID.

response.name: Product Retrieved
response.body:
{
  "id": "product_id",
  "name": "Paracetamol 500mg",
  "description": "Pain reliever and fever reducer",
  "price": 10.99,
  "category": "MEDICATION",
  "isNearExpiry": false,
  "expiryDate": null,
  "imageUrl": null,
  "stock": 100,
  "pharmacyOwnerId": "pharmacy_owner_id",
  "createdAt": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "updatedAt": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "pharmacyOwner": {
    "pharmacyName": "Example Pharmacy",
    "contactPerson": "John Doe",
    "phoneNumber": "+1234567890",
    "address": "123 Main St, City",
    "city": "Cairo",
    "area": "Nasr City"
  }
}

item.name: Pharmacy Owner Store Endpoints

request.description: Creates a new product for the authenticated pharmacy owner.
Gets all products for the authenticated pharmacy owner.

variable.description: ID of the product to update

request.description: Updates an existing product. Pharmacy Owner only.

variable.description: ID of the product to delete

request.description: Deletes a product. Pharmacy Owner only.

item.description: Store endpoints for authenticated pharmacy owners.
Endpoints for managing products in the store.

item.name: Subscription Endpoints

request.description: Gets all available subscription plans with pricing information.

response.name: Pricing Retrieved Successfully

request.description: Updates pricing and features for a subscription plan. Admin only.

response.name: Pricing Updated Successfully

request.description: Gets the current user's subscription status and details.

response.name: Subscription Retrieved Successfully

request.description: Upgrades the user's subscription to a higher plan.

response.name: Subscription Upgraded Successfully

item.description: Endpoints for managing subscription plans and pricing.

item.name: Admin Endpoints

request.description: Admin login endpoint
Get platform statistics and overview
Get all users with filtering options
Update user subscription or availability
Get payment requests with filtering
Confirm or reject payment request
Reject payment request with reason
Get wallet configurations
Create new wallet configuration
Get wallet information for payments
Get user's payment requests
Update payment request with transaction details

item.description: Admin endpoints for platform management and payment confirmation.
